page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT IN HARDWICK AREA
page.content:
The population of the area covered is approximately 350.The number unemployed is below average for this part of the country.There are several private businesses including builders, car repairers,boarding kennels,haulage firm,animal feed firm & road asphalting which employ local people. The largest employer is the land itself,since there are 28 farms in the area & 2 broiler house complexes.The farms range from small units which support the family to the larger ones that provide work for additional local labour.Hardwick services include a sweep,hairdresser & PO shop.The remainder of the working population travel outside the area,& there is the average number of pensioners.
Contributers to survey Pulham Market W.I & Local Inhabitants.
